meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> that is <radical>white</radical>, traveling in the <radical>direction</radical> of <radical>winter</radical> is a <kanji>fierce</kanji> and <kanji>violent</kanji> force of nature. This white tsunami is chasing after winter, and that’s why the tsunami is white—it’s a winter tsunami. It’s the most fierce and most violent kind of tsunami in existence.
readingMnemonic: The tsunami is too <kanji>fierce</kanji>, too <kanji>violent</kanji>, and before you realize what's happening, <reading>Gecki</reading> (げき), your beloved gecko, is lifted up and carried off into the air.
